TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpResponseBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表類別的基底類別 (Base Class)，這些類別提供來自 ASP.NET 作業的 HTTP 回應資訊。

span.span: Represents the base class for classes that provides HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，且該工作外的 ASP.NET 管線。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，您通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例中的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members that have customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，您通常使用的執行個體類別來呼叫的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

Public Overridable Function AddOnSendingHeaders (callback As Action(Of HttpContextBase)) As ISubscriptionToken
public: virtual System::Web::ISubscriptionToken ^ AddOnSendingHeaders(Action<System::Web::HttpContextBase ^> ^ callback);

param.name: callback
param.span: 回呼方法。

span.span: The callback method.

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]

summary.span: 註冊 ASP.NET 執行階段會立即在回應標頭傳送給這個要求之前叫用的回呼。

span.span: Registers a callback that the ASP.NET runtime will invoke immediately before response headers are sent for this request.

returns.span: 傳回表示訂閱 OnSendingHeaders 虛擬事件的 物件。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the subscription to the OnSendingHeaders pseudo event..

remarks.format: ## Remarks OnSendingHeaders 虛擬事件與不同層級 IHttpModule 管線事件，因為它要求每個訂用帳戶，而不是每個應用程式的訂用帳戶。The pseudo event OnSendingHeaders differs from the IHttpModule-level pipeline event in that it is a per-request subscription rather than a per-application subscription. 其目的是回呼可能會修改回應狀態碼，或可能會設定回應的 cookie 或標頭。The intent is that the callback may modify the response status code or may set a response cookie or header. 其他的使用方式的事項及警告：Other usage notes and caveats: - IIS integrated 的管線模式管線中執行時，才，而且只有在回應標頭尚未針對目前的要求已傳送，這個方法會有效。This method is effective only when IIS runs in integrated pipeline mode pipeline and only if response headers haven't yet been sent for the current request. - ASP.NET 執行階段不保證任何關於的執行緒叫用回呼。The ASP.NET runtime does not guarantee anything about the thread that the callback is invoked on. 例如，可能會叫用回呼以同步方式在背景執行緒中如果正在執行背景清除。For example, the callback may be invoked synchronously in a background thread if a background flush is being performed. 不保證可在這類執行緒中使用。 is not guaranteed to be available in such a thread. - 回呼必須呼叫操縱回應實體本文或排清，產生的任何方法。The callback must not call any method that manipulates the response entity body or that results in a flush. 例如，不可呼叫回呼，因為該方法可能會操作回應實體本文。For example, the callback must not call , as that method may manipulate the response entity body. - 回呼必須只包含執行短期同步程式碼。The callback must contain only short-running synchronous code. 嘗試叫用非同步作業，或等候這類作業可能會導致死結。Attempting to invoke an asynchronous operation or wait on such an operation could result in a deadlock. - 回呼必須不會擲回例外狀況。否則行為是未定義。The callback must not throw an exception; otherwise behavior is undefined.

span.span: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.

summary.span: 您可以在下列網址上，找到更多有關 HTTP2 伺服器推播的詳細資料：[HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources) (HTTP/2 規格 8.2 節：伺服器推播)。

span.span: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).

remarks.format: ## Remarks PushPromise 不具決定性，而且應用程式不應該擁有邏輯取決於它。PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it. 其唯一目的是在某些情況下的效能優勢。Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases. 有可能會導致完全忽略推播要求的許多情況 （通訊協定和實作）。There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely. 預期為基礎和不理 」。The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.

.property instance bool SuppressDefaultCacheControlHeader
Public Overridable Property SuppressDefaultCacheControlHeader As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SuppressDefaultCacheControlHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要隱藏目前 HTTP 回應的預設 Cache Control: private 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to suppress the default Cache Control: private header for the current HTTP response.

value.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，ASP.NET 會`Cache-Control: private`回應標頭除非這個回應已指定明確的快取原則。By default, ASP.NET sends a `Cache-Control: private` response header unless an explicit cache policy has been specified for this response. 這個屬性可讓隱藏每個要求為基礎的這個預設回應標頭。This property allows suppressing this default response header on a per-request basis. 標頭可以仍然隱藏整個應用程式藉由設定中[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)或[outputCache 項目，快取 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/47cd2b47-316f-4dfd-bbf8-539be3066fee).The header can still be suppressed for the entire application by setting in [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) or [outputCache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/47cd2b47-316f-4dfd-bbf8-539be3066fee). 抑制預設時謹慎小心`Cache-Control: private`標頭，做為 proxy 與其他媒介之間進行可能沒有這個標頭的回應可快取，以視為預設。Use caution when suppressing the default `Cache-Control: private` header, as proxies and other intermediaries may treat responses without this header as cacheable by default. 此處理方式可能會導致機密資訊不小心快取。This treatment can lead to the inadvertent caching of sensitive information. 請參閱[RFC 2616，秒 13.4](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616)如需詳細資訊。See [RFC 2616, Sec. 13.4](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616) for more information.
